predicate.note: Frames file for 'tag' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: Hyundai Motor America , [*-1] fighting quality complaints , declining sales and management turmoil , yesterday unveiled its 1990 ad strategy , tagged [*] `` We 're Making More Sense Than Ever . ''
example.arg: We 're Making More Sense Than Ever
